title: Morality: the process of moral development (TEFC)
creator_credit: Davidson Films, Eclipse Films (US), Marcus Krigbaum and Roy Anthony Cox
brief_description: Dr Susan Merrsemen-Warren and Dr Elliot Turiel interview and test children from the age of four until early adulthood in order to examine their concepts of sharing, fairness, justice, and other attitudes linked to the process of moral development.
